General.Name: Guangdong Yantang Dairy Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Yantang Dairy Co., Ltd. research, develops, processes, markets, and sells dairy products in China. Its products include health foods, nectars, healthy bacteria, probiotic flavored fermented milk, Greek and cereal yogurts, chocolate milk drinks, and fresh milk. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
